themes: lack of transparency in award recipient information
clarity in representation of different artistic disciplines
key_phrases: transparency around which specific categories each award recipient falls under
just a list of awards recipients names with no info
a pie chart showing how each category is represented in awards would provide clarity
Individual Musician, individual visual artist, creative business, event planner, theater, performing arts, film maker, gallery, curator, writer, teacher, etc
barriers_identified: lack of information about awardee categories
insufficient clarity on representation of artistic disciplines
solutions_proposed: provide specific categories for each award recipient
publish a pie chart showing category representation in awards
